column5: Here is the info if your in the area.  http://www.billsbaitandtackle.ca/modules.p...topic&t=410

Thanks guys... If I was not on Trout Lake during that time frame I would be there!!  Hopefully you fellas have a great turn out!  I know you have done things for our (OFC) special events... I hope some OFC'rs can contribute to yours!   Gerritt.
